analyzed: gzhan sel brtag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa /

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de phyir rang bzhin tha dad la //
analyzed: de phyir rang bzhin tha dad la //
translated: Therefore, due to the difference in nature,

analyzed: 'bras sogs mtshungs pa mthong ba'i phyir //

original: don gyi bya ba gcig byed pa //
analyzed: don gyi bya ba gcig byed pa //

analyzed: de dag 'dus pa'i sgrar brjod do //

analyzed: khyim dang dmag dang nags tshogs bzhin // gang dag dus dang rnam rtog gis //

analyzed: 'bras bu gcig ni byed pa rnams //

original: de dag rigs sgrar brjod bya ste //
analyzed: de dag rigs sgrar brjod bya ste //

analyzed: dper na bde sdug la sogs bzhin // gang dag rim gyis 'brel par ni //

original: skye zhing don byed bzod pa rnams //
analyzed: skye zhing don byed bzod pa rnams //

original: de dag rgyun sgrar brjod bya ste //
analyzed: de dag rgyun sgrar brjod bya ste //

original: rgyun dang rang bzo'i rgyun bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyun dang rang bzo'i rgyun bzhin no //

original: gcig yin du mar rung yin zhing //
analyzed: gcig yin du mar rung yin zhing //

analyzed: blo yis @197b char ni rnam brtags nas //

analyzed: gnas skabs bye brag bstan bya ste //

analyzed: gang yang dngos gcig yul can ni //

analyzed: nyi zla nam mkha'i sgra bzhin no //

original: mchu dus cha shas bye brag la //
analyzed: mchu dus cha shas bye brag la //

analyzed: dngos med la ni gang dag yin //

analyzed: de dag phyi la mi ltos par //

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid mi snang na // de la snang ba ma yin pa //

analyzed: 'di ltar bye brag don med cing //
